page.title: 12Transport in Weaverthorpe
page.content: The{National Bus Service}runs a bus {service morning and evening}each working day, mainly to take workers to Dewhirst's clothing factory at {Driffield.}On{2 days each week}there is a bus from{Malton to Driffield passing through Weaverthorpe. Since many of the men and young people work outside the village, most families {have to provide their own transport.} If grown-up children still live at home then there may be 2,3 or 4 cars. People working in Driffield, Malton and Scarborough take at least one other person in their cars. The nearest{frequent bus service} runs along the{A64, from Malton to {Scarborough,}stopping at Sherburn, 4 miles away. The{nearest train services}are at {Scarborough, Malton and Driffield.}
